snippet: Recognizing that it lags the other branches of the military in female and minority officers, the Marines have started an effort to diversify.
abstract: United States Marine Corps, long dominated by white men, is starting marketing campaign to attract more minorities and women into its officer corps.
lead_paragraph: Recognizing that it lags the other branches of the military in female and minority officers, the Marines have started an effort to diversify.

headline.seo: Marine Corps Seeks Minority and Female Officers
headline.main: Marine Corps Starts Ad Campaign to Try to Diversify Officer Ranks
headline.print_headline: Marine Corps Starts Ad Campaign to Try to Diversify Officer Ranks

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
